title: ðŸš¨ Philip Rivers retires after 17 seasons & Will Brinson reacts - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/20)
description:
Will Brinson knew this day would eventually come. It's a day where he must say goodbye to the pro career of his favorite football player ever. That's right, Philip Rivers has retired after 17 seasons in the NFL. Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson to react to the news. The guys analyze the timing of the decision and dig into Rivers' legacy, asking the all-important question, "is he a Hall of Famer?" After remembering his career, Will and Ryan look ahead to what's next for the Colts at quarterback. Join us for this special and sad emergency episode.Â 
ï»¿'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
